config.title: Commit Message Validation

enabled.label: Commit message validation enabled
enabled.helpText: If enabled each new commit will validated for the commit message.

disableRepositoryConfiguration.label: Disabled repository-specific configuration
disableRepositoryConfiguration.helpText: If checked it is not possible to create a custom configuration for a repository.

config.noValidationsConfigured: There are no validations configured yet.
config.noMoreValidatorsAvailable: There are no more validators available.

newValidation.label: Add new validation
newValidation.helpText: All added validators will be executed for each new commit.

CustomRegExValidator.name: Custom regex validator
CustomRegExValidator.description: Use your custom regular expression pattern for validation.

pattern.label: Pattern
pattern.helpText:
Custom regular expression for validation.

Example: ^[A-Za-z0-9 ]+$

branches.label: Branches
branches.helpText:
List of the branches which should be validated separated by comma. To validate all branches just set "*".

Example: master,feature/*

errorMessage.label: Error message
errorMessage.helpText: Error which will be shown to the user on commit message validation failure.
